library(tidyverse)

ggplot2::theme_set(theme_bw())

tt_borders <- function(t) {
	t %>%
		style_tt(i = 0, line = "t", line_color = "grey20", line_width = 0.8) %>% 
		style_tt(i = 0, line = "b", line_width = 0.1, line_color = "grey20") %>% 
		style_tt(i = nrow(t), line = "b", line_width = 0.2,line_color = "grey20")
}
